thread.title: BREAKING: Jeremy Corbyn ‘set to RESIGN after giving departure date’, reports claim
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Jeremy Corbyn ‘set to RESIGN after giving departure date’, reports claim

title: BREAKING: Jeremy Corbyn ‘set to RESIGN after giving departure date’, reports claim
text:
BREAKING: Jeremy Corbyn ‘set to RESIGN after giving departure date’, reports claim BREAKING: Jeremy Corbyn ‘set to RESIGN after giving departure date’, reports claim JEREMY Corbyn could be set to step down as the Labour party leader after allegedly giving his close allies a departure date, a series of unconfirmed tweets have claimed.  50, Wed, Feb 8, 2017 TWITTER/GETTY Could the Labour leader be set to step down? 
In a number of tweets early on Wednesday morning, Manchester Evening News reporter Jennifer Williams claimed Corbyn is not expected to leave immediately but has made plans to resign as the Leader of the Opposition. 
She wrote: “Am told corbyn has given a departure date to his close circle. Hence the frenzy. 
“Single sourced, I would add. Just to be total disclosure.” Related articles
